text: mage amma sansare aa gonu kara gatha karma pala walata anukula bhawayak patha apen sadahatama samugena danata pas wasaraki.
"na sar, dan amma innawane, dannam poddakata kadeta gihin mallith ekka..."

ehemayi kiyala thanikadawa hitiya nam hondayi kiyala mama kisima welawaka hithanne na.

aanduwa wisuruwa harimata janapathi gath thiranaya abhiyogayata lak karamin gonu kala pethsam salaka bala athuru thahanam niyogayak nikuth kala adhikaranaya ehi thinduwa laba dimata gena thibena kalaya wadiya.adala kala simawa digu wima nisa ada eeta paksha ha wipaksha piris mahaparata basa wiwidha wirodhatha pawathwimata patan gena atha.parlimenthuwa nadagam maduwak bawata path wemin mahajana mudal kabasiniya karana thanak bawata pathwa thibe.aarawulak pawathina idamaka ek parshwayak maima yayi sithana kotasaka thappayak idikarana awasthawaka anek parshwayata adhikaranaye pihita pathiya hakiya.ehidi adhikaranaya athuru thahanam niyogayak nikuth karanu labanne deparshwaya athara arbudayak athi wima walakwanu pinisaya.ewani awasthawaka thappaya idikala parshwayata thawa duratath thappaya bandimata awasara nolabeyi.
